data.persona: I am the local blacksmith. I repair items made of iron as well as create new ones. I am frequently covered in soot as my job requires a lot of ash and heat.
data.description:
You are in the Knife Seller.
The wooden shop's walls are adorned with a variety of steel, iron, and bronze knives. They vary in shape and size, with some being curved and others being small enough to conceal.
The soldier and the jester are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a blacksmith's hammer and a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the jester so that I can greet the jester and show off my crafts.
data.mid_motivation: I have come to deliver and sell some knives at the Knife Seller.
data.long_motivation: I need to earn some money so that I can open my own shop to sell my weapons.
